title: Love, Faith and Money
teaser:
A man enters a world of high stakes gambling; a family tragedy turns into a stand-off with police detectives; a neuroscientist searches for clues of God's existence . 
 
The Moth Radio hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media in Woods Hole, Massachusetts
contentencoded:
Shannon Cason comes face to face with his gambling addiction.
 
Prinna Boudreau becomes the focus of a police investigation after the loss of her infant daughter.
 
Christof Koch  questions his belief in God while working with Francis Crick.
